welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Edgewood, known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves as the primary hub for all airlines and offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to several domestic and international airlines, as well as a variety of dining and shopping options for passengers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves Southwest Airlines and offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers, including dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is home to several airlines, including American Airlines and Delta, and offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
